helpAllSizes: All sizes: max 1 base ingredient and max 1 topping and 1 boost
juiceWaiting: You've got an order, press enter to view!
helpChoose: First choose 1 base and thereafter choose max
changeBiggerSize: Change to a bigger size by pressing
helpCustom: Customize the proportions of your fruits and greens by dragging the sliders
helpExtra: Add 1 boost and/or 1 topping for an additional cost
extraExpl: A boost is an extra ingredient blended into your beverage and a topping adds an extra ingredient on top of your beverage
extraAddMax: You can add maximum 1 boost and 1 topping
toppingSprinkled: Sprinkled on top of your drink
helpOver: Here is an overview of your order. Want to change something? Go back clicking the navigation buttons in the bottom of this page
clickPay: Click on Pay n Shake to send your order to the kitchen
helpBaseSize: The base's proportion of the beverage is always a third and cannot be changed
havetoBase: You have to select 1 base in order to proceed
chosenOneBase: You have chosen one base and
recommend: We recommend to choose at least 2 ingredients so that you can customize your proportions
satisfied: If you are satisfied with your choice and wish to continue anyway, go forward using the Choose Extras button
notAbleCustom: You are not able to customize your proportions because you have chosen fewer than 2 ingredients
ifMoreIngred: If you would like to add more ingredients, go back using the Ingredients button
